00022 CrgUnit::~CrgUnit()
00023 {
00024     //   cout << "[crgunit.h]: Calling the crgunit destructor." << endl;
00025     _planes.clear();
00026     _positions.clear();
00027     _norms.clear();
00028 }
00029 
00030 CrgUnit::CrgUnit(vector <vec> positions, vector <vec> norms, vector <vec> planes,
00031         const unsigned int & id, CrgUnitType * type, const unsigned int & molId)
00032 {
00033     vector <vec>::iterator it_pos;
00034     vector <vec>::iterator it_norm;
00035     vector <vec>::iterator it_planes;
00036     //    _com = vec(0., 0., 0.);
00037     double toll = 1E-6;
00038     vec xvec(1.0, 0., 0.);
00039     vec yvec(0., 1., 0.);
00040     for (it_pos = positions.begin(), it_norm = norms.begin(), it_planes = planes.begin()
00041             ; it_pos != positions.end(); ++it_pos, ++it_norm, ++it_planes) {
00042         _positions.push_back(*it_pos);
00043         if (abs(*it_norm) > toll && abs(*it_planes) > toll) {
00044             _norms.push_back(*it_norm);
00045             _planes.push_back(*it_planes);
00046         }
00047         else {
00048             _norms.push_back(xvec);
00049             _planes.push_back(yvec);
00050         }
00051         //        _com = _com + *it_pos;
00052 
00053     }
00054     //    _com /= positions.size();
00055     _molid = molId;
00056     _id = id;
00057     _type = type;
00058 
00059    
00060 }
00061 
00062 void CrgUnit::copyCrgUnit(CrgUnit & acrg)
00063 {
00064     vector <vec>::iterator it_pos;
00065     vector <vec>::iterator it_norm;
00066     vector <vec>::iterator it_planes;
00067     //    _com = acrg._com;
00068     _positions.clear();
00069     _norms.clear();
00070     _planes.clear();
00071     for (it_pos = (acrg._positions).begin(),
00072             it_norm = (acrg._norms).begin(),
00073             it_planes = (acrg._planes).begin()
00074             ; it_pos != (acrg._positions).end(); ++it_pos, ++it_norm, ++it_planes) {
00075         _positions.push_back(*it_pos);
00076         _norms.push_back(*it_norm);
00077         _planes.push_back(*it_planes);
00078 
00079     }
00080     _molid = acrg._molid;
00081     _id = acrg._id;
00082     _type = acrg._type;
00083 
00084     // initialise variables derived from CrgUnitType
00085    
00086 
00087     _name = acrg._name;
00088 }
00089 
00090 mol_and_orb * CrgUnit::rotate_translate_beads()
00091 {
00092     mol_and_orb *a = new mol_and_orb;
00093     orb * _orb = new orb;
00094     a->define_bs(_type->GetBS());
00095     a->cp_atompos(_type->GetCrgUnit());
00096     a->cp_atoms(_type->GetCrgUnit());
00097     _orb->init_orbitals_stripped(_type->GetOrb(), _type->GetTransOrbs().size());
00098     a->assign_orb(_orb);
00099 
00100     _type->rotate_each_bead(_positions.begin(), _norms.begin(),
00101             _planes.begin(), a);
00102     return a;
00103 }

00163 void CrgUnit::rotate(matrix mat)
00164 {
00165     vector <vec> ::iterator it_norm = _norms.begin();
00166     vector <vec> ::iterator it_plane = _planes.begin();
00167     for (; it_norm != _norms.end(); ++it_norm, ++it_plane) {
00168         vec a = *it_norm;
00169         vec b = *it_plane;
00170         *it_norm = mat * a;
00171         *it_plane = mat * b;
00172     }
00173     vec a;
00174     //    vec a = mat * _com;
00175     //    _com = a;
00176     vector < vec> ::iterator it_vec;
00177     /*for (it_vec = _altcom.begin() ; it_vec != _altcom.end(); ++it_vec) {
00178         a = *it_vec;
00179      *it_vec = mat * (*it_vec);
00180     }*/
00181     for (it_vec = _positions.begin(); it_vec != _positions.end(); ++it_vec) {
00182         a = *it_vec;
00183         *it_vec = mat * (*it_vec);
00184     }
00185     /*vector < vector < vec > > :: iterator it_altpos;
00186     for (it_altpos = _altpos.begin() ; it_altpos != _altpos.end() ; ++it_altpos){
00187         for (it_vec =  it_altpos->begin(); it_vec != it_altpos->end() ; ++it_vec ){
00188             a = *it_vec;
00189      *it_vec = mat * (*it_vec);
00190         }
00191     }*/
00192 }
